title: league of no chat?
body: is riot doing anything about this no chat business or are we just out of luck?

replies.body:
Hey!

We're currently investigating the issue. MuffyKing [made a post](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report/Nf5ToE3O-client-alot-of-players-from-southern-states-cant-connect-to-client-chat?comment=0004) regarding this issue, and how you can provide more info to help us get to the bottom of this. :]

Here is the tracer that i just did from the link you hyperlinked in your comment. If you need a screenshot I can do that as well, Don't know how that would help but if you guys need one i can do that as well. ill keep up with the forums as well to see if a fix happens
My apologies. my chat is now working. seems like it was fixed
good question mine has been messed up for 3 games now -.-

Heya
No Chat issue?
